title: Why lasers are being used to write inside diamonds
description: A British company is using unique technology to inscribe diamonds with sophisticated lasers.

title: Investors dump Amazon as economy concerns grow
description: The tech giant warned of slower growth as shoppers return to bricks and mortar stores.

title: Lee Jae-yong: Samsung appoints convicted heir to top job
description: Lee Jae-yong was found guilty of bribery and embezzlement before being granted a presidential pardon.

title: Black women missing from tech industry, says report
description: A report says an additional 20,000 black women need to be recruited to match numbers in the wider workforce.
